notes.DEVICE: Which device should torch cast to for training.
notes.DATAROOT: Root directory of dataset, should contrain test/train/val folder structure.
notes.OUTPUT_DIRECTORY: Root output directory where experiment output directory is created.
notes.NUM_EPOCHS: How many epochs to run the current train for.
notes.BATCH_SIZE: Training batch size. Pix2pix paper default is 1.
notes.NUM_WORKERS: Number of subprocesses used to load data.
notes.INPUT_NC: Number of channels in input image. 1 for mono, 3 for RGB
notes.LOAD_SIZE: Size in pixels to load dataset images.
notes.CROP_SIZE: Size in pixels to crop dataset images.
notes.LAMBDA_L1: Scaling factor for generator L1 loss.
notes.LAMBDA_SOBEL: Scaling factor for generator sobel loss.
notes.BASE_CHANNELS_D: Filter count for first discriminator conv layer
notes.MAX_CHANNELS_D: Max filters per discriminator conv layer.
notes.CONTINUE_TRAIN: Resume training of model from a checkpoint.
notes.LOAD_EPOCH: Epoch to load if CONTINUE_TRAIN is true.
notes.MODEL_SAVE_RATE: Rate in epochs at which to save checkpoint files if SAVE_MODEL is true.
notes.UPDATE_FREQUENCY: Frequency (in iterations) of updates to loss and visualizer data.
